price: 39. Ia (Iblis) berkata, “Tuhanku, oleh karena Engkau telah memutuskan bahwa aku sesat, aku pasti akan jadikan (kejahatan) terasa indah bagi mereka di bumi, dan aku akan menyesatkan mereka semuanya,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā aghwaytanī la-uzayyinanna lahum fī al-arḍi wala-ugh'wiyannahum ajmaʿīna
